Your responsibilities As a part of our team, you will: • Work with new products and technologies. • Software installs, system configurations, restoring, and backing up databases. • Programming in PHP, HTML, and CSS using a MYSQL database. Update and create new features in Web Lab tools. • Job Requirements Your skills and experience Qualifications: • Strong relationship-building and communication (both written and verbal) skills are required. • The candidate must be able to work effectively in a team-oriented environment. • Demonstrated ability to learn quickly and thrive in a fast-paced, innovative setting. It would be nice if you also had: • Knowledge of IP networking, familiar with networking concepts. • Familiar or proficient with different LINUX operating systems (i.e., CentOS) Scripting languages - Bash, PHP, and CSS • Citizenship Requirement N/A Position Start Date Position End Date May 04, 2026 12:00 AM August 28, 2026 12:00 AM APPLICATION INFORMATION Application Procedure Through Employer Website Cover Letter Required?
